channel.title: DeepLearning on Himanshu Panwar
channel.description: Recent content in DeepLearning on Himanshu Panwar

item.title: Intro to Neural Networks for NLP
item.description: Overview Language is HARD and COMPLICATED. There are some techniques which we can use to extract information from the text. There are things that needs to be handled to be able to understand any text sentence like morphology, syntax, word knowledge, discourse, pragmatics, multi linguality etc. For these hard things we use Neural Networks. In this blog, we will learn about some concepts to do such things. Problem Statement : Sentiment Classification

item.title: Setting Up Paperspace for Deep Learning
item.description: Step by Step Guide to Setup Paperspace Machine for Deep Learning Create an Account : paperspace.com Sign up with my promo code for Paperspace to get a $10 credit! Add in credit card information (required, even if you have a promo code) Go to https://www.paperspace.com/console/machines and click New Machine. Choose a region near to you. Choose Ubuntu 16.04 in Linux Templates. Create new P4000 machine with at least 50 GB storage and a public IP and turn off Auto Snapshot (just for saving).
